TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Illuminati Confirmed!

Waiter, there's a Bill Murray in my soup!

Well, it's a good thing you weren't looking for laughs at this restaurant, because that is one unfunny man!

Waiter, there's a- *vomits and dies of food poisoning

(Silently looking for a fee in his pockets, then Inviting the next client.)
"Bring another portion or you will eat up his one, sir?"

Waiter, why this body's head in my soup?

Ah, well, our cooking does tastes very good. This last victim- erm , ah, well, I mean customer found to all tooo exciting and had a total organ failu- um, that is to say, heart attack

Waiter, there's a cardboard cutout of an octopus cat in my soup

thats a lemon sir...

waiter! theres some sort of disembodied ham in my soup!

<southern US accent> I reckon y'all want the entire hog?

 

Waiter! This soup is so cold, there's hydrogen ice i n it!

That's because you came to this restaurant which happens to be on Eeloo. 

Waiter, there's a Saturn V in my soup!

that is a celery stick sticking out of the soup sir...

waiter! theres some energy in my soup!

What, do you want it to be cold?

Waiter, there is soup in my soup!

My apologies, the chef forgot to add the recursive remoulade to complete the dish!

 

Waiter! There's an unusually large kayak in my soup.

Yes, well, you did order the floating pancetta, did you not?

Waiter, there's a very angry cat in my soup

name it angry cat and make a living off internet memes from it!

waiter! my soups in my soup!

Of course theres soup in soup if there isn't any soup in soup than said soup wouldn't be soup due to lack of soup!

Waiter, there is a full sized Delta IV Heavy in my soup and it does NOT look green! Or orange.

My apologies, we will RMA it back to Amazon and get the correct one. Should only take 3-4 business years.

 

Waiter, I seem to be missing my soup!

Well, we don't let customers bring food from the outside.

Waiters, there happens to be a Space X landing barge in my soup!

OMG Please tell me the Falcon 9 landed on it!!!!!!

Waiter! The soup is too big! The whole planet is swimming in it!

Sir, that's just meatball soup. 

Waiter! There's too much hydrogen sulfide in my soup!

Ehm... 
It's not a soup, I am not a waiter, and you again opened a wrong door and washed plates in toilet.
Now return to the kitchen and wash those plates once more.

Waiter! There's no plate between my soup and the table.

Well, it  seems that our superconductors work

waiter, there is a                                                    in my soup

Well of course                                                         you see?

Waiter there is highly unstable N1 rocket in my soup!

Well I hope it launches soon.

Waiter, there's an SSTO in my soup!

it IS Seven Simply Terrible Objects stew, after all.

 

Waiter, there's an overabundance of Sodium Tetrachloropalladate in my bowl!

Edited December 7, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar

We're sorry, but you're probably going to die.

 

Waiter, there's an ak47 in my soup! HELP!!!

well, due to our 2nd amendment, it is allowed to be yours!

waiter! theres some Adenosine Triphosphate in my soup!

That's probably going to kill you as well. (Geez, how bad are our cooks?)

Waiter, there's a miniature model of the Taj Mahal in my soup! (Can I keep it?)
